name: THRIVE (Maexen)
description:
THRIVE is a civilization simulation with an minimaltistic art style. You can expand the world by adding new tiles, this will also increase your resources and resource income. When you have collected enough resources you may further expand by adding new tiles or you start creating the environtment, by adding forests, caves (which can be later used as mines), fields and wells (which a used for a new colony to start).
